<h3 id="X39652">X(39652) = PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: 8TH BROCARD AND ANTI-1ST-BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; -a^8 + 2*a^6*b^2 - 2*a^4*b^4 + 2*a^6*c^2 - 2*a^4*c^4 + b^4*c^4 : :
<p>
